content: space after a 3 double_crochet group folding large petals forward double_crochet in chain space chain 3 placing a stitch marker in the last chain first occasion only skip next st the double_crochet double_crochet in next chain space skip next st 3 double_crochet in next st skip next st x 8 40 double_crochet 8 x chain-3 reverse view - 7 - r8 work in r7 r6 and r5 as indicated single_crochet in chain space in marked location fptr around centre double_crochet of 3dc group in r6 just below and slightly ahead returning to r7 skip next 2 st half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in next st centre of 3 double_crochet group fptr around same st as last fptr in r6 returning to r7 skip next 2 st 2 single_crochet in next chain space slip_stitch fairly loosely in back bump the third loop of next 3 centre scs at top of large petal r5 returning to r7 2 single_crochet in same chain space x 8 omitting last single_crochet 32 single_crochet 16 fptr 16 half_double_crochet 24 slip_stitch 8 x chain-2 stitch counts given per side from now on r9 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in centre slip_stitch at top of large petal corner made skip next st double_crochet in next 2 st chain-3 skip next 6 st the fptr half_double_crochet chain-2 half_double_crochet fptr single_crochet in next 3 st skip next st the centre slip_stitch catching in the next large petal single_crochet in next 3 st chain 3 skip next 6 st as before double_crochet in next 2 st skip next st repeat from beginning all around 8 double_crochet 6 single_crochet 2 x chain-3 1 x chain-2 per side the top of each kite shape from r8 should sit in front of the chain-3 space in r9 - 8 - r10 decrease chain 2 decrease chain 2 decrease in corner chain space skip next hidden st double_crochet in next 2 st half_double_crochet in next st working in front of r9 half_double_crochet in chain space in r8 below top of kite returning to r9 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space half_double_crochet in next 6 st 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space working in front of r9 half_double_crochet in chain space in r8 below returning to r9 half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 2 st skip next last st repeat from beginning all around 3 decrease 4 double_crochet 14 half_double_crochet 2 x chain-2 per side - 9 - r11 tricky round - don t miss the trebles each side of the corners decrease chain 2 decrease in first chain space of corner group chain 2 forms corner chain space skip next st decrease chain 2 decrease in next chain space working in front of r10 treble_crochet in unworked st in r9 below returning to r10 skip next st the decrease half_double_crochet in next 6 st single_crochet in next st chain 1 skip next 2 st decrease chain 2 decrease chain 2 decrease in next st chain 1 skip next 2 st single_crochet in next st
